statements: DELETE FROM templates WHERE template_name = 'Invoice Template';
DELETE FROM layouts WHERE layout_name = 'Simple Layout';
DELETE FROM layouts WHERE layout_id = 10 OR layout_id = 20;
DELETE FROM whiteboards WHERE name = 'Example Whiteboard';
DELETE FROM whiteboards WHERE owner_id = 5 AND created_date < '2022-01-01';
